data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 1, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jovane Cabral for Sporting who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jovane Cabral for Sporting is back on the field again.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Sporting in the half of Benfica.
Sporting's Jovane Cabral gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Sporting have a goal kick.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Sporting.
In the minute 10, Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
Benfica pushes forward through Pizzi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sporting are pushing forward but Matheus Nunes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 11, Fabio Verissimo awards Benfica a goal kick.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 12, Benfica's Chiquinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Benfica surge into the attack at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica but Jardelâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Pizzi for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 17, Benfica's Haris Seferovic has run offside.
Andraz Sporar for Sporting drives towards goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Sporting.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Ruben Dias (Benfica) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 21, Sporting have a goal kick.
Free kick Sporting.
Gabriel Appelt is booked for the home team.
In the minute 25, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Chiquinho (Benfica) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In the minute 26, Throw-in high up the field for Benfica in Lisbon.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Benfica push forward at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica and Chiquinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sporting defence.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Goal! Benfica have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Haris Seferovic.
In the minute 28, That's a fine assist from Ruben Dias.
Fabio Verissimo awards Sporting a goal kick.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 30, Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sporting's half?
Fabio Verissimo signals a Benfica throw-in in Sporting's half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Sporting.
In the minute 36, Free kick Sporting.
Benfica are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sporting's Luis Neto has been booked in Lisbon.
Benfica drive upfield and Pizzi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sporting defender.
In the minute 38, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Agony for Benfica as Ruben Dias 's header comes back off the post and is cleared.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 39, In Lisbon Sporting drive forward through Jovane Cabral. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Sporting's Andraz Sporar is whistled for offside at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
In the minute 45, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Sporting.
In Lisbon Benfica attack through Gabriel Appelt. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Lisbon.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Benfica.
The away team have replaced Gonzalo Plata with Tiago Tomas. This is the first substitution made today by Ruben Amorim.
Jardel gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benfica.
Benfica have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Benfica drive forward but Haris Seferovic is judged offside.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In Lisbon, Pizzi of Benfica is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 50, Benfica's Franco Cervi breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Fabio Verissimo awards Sporting a goal kick.
Sporting's Nuno Mendes gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Sporting.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Can Sporting capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 56, Benfica are coming forward and Haris Seferovic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
Free kick Benfica.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Benfica, close to Sporting's area.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
In the minute 60, Benfica attack but Jardel's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Sporting's Jovane Cabral breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Throw-in Sporting.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 63, Sporting's Stefan Ristovski gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Benfica defender.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Benfica will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sporting.
In the minute 65, Sporting's Tiago Tomas fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Wendel of Sporting gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 65, Fabio Verissimo awards Benfica a goal kick.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Verissimo (Benfica) is making a first substitution, with Florentino Luis replacing Gabriel Appelt.
Carlos Vinicius is replacing Haris Seferovic for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Goal! Andraz Sporar levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 69, Tiago Tomas instrumental with a fine assist.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica, Jovane Cabral has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Sporting.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 73, Andre Almeida (Benfica) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 74, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Sporting.
In Lisbon Sporting attack through Stefan Ristovski. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Sporting close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Sporting.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
In the minute 76, Verissimo is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica with Rafa Silva replacing Chiquinho.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wendel (Sporting) has received a yellow card from Fabio Verissimo.
In the minute 78, Sporting needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Benfica throw-in in Sporting's half.
In the minute 79, Benfica's Rafa Silva gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 80, Free kick Benfica.
Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jovane Cabral.
In the minute 82, Jovane Cabral returns to the field for Sporting after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Sporting.
Sporting have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Ruben Amorim (Sporting) is making a second substitution, with Luciano Vietto replacing Nuno Mendes.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ruben Amorim (Sporting) has taken off Jovane Cabral who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Cristian Borja is the replacement.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
Rodrigo Battaglia is replacing Stefan Ristovski for Sporting at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Benfica push upfield but Fabio Verissimo quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 88, Carlos Vinicius puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Benfica.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Benfica.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo blows against Benfica's Pizzi for offside.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
The home team have replaced Franco Cervi with Jota. This is the fourth substitution made today by Verissimo.
Carlos Vinicius for Benfica has been booked by Fabio Verissimo and receives a first yellow card.
